profile.name: TJ
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering scalable web applications with Apex
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with expertise in Go, JavaScript, and Ruby. Proven track record of developing efficient tools for task runners, static website generators, and video processing.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Apex
description: Designed and implemented a scalable web application using React Router and Node.js.
Developed a task runner tool for efficient code execution and optimized performance.
Collaborated with the team to deploy static website generators for seamless user experience.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a web application using JavaScript and React Router for a client in the e-commerce industry.
Created a static website generator tool for a client in the finance sector.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open source projects using Go and Ruby.
Contributed to the development of a popular web framework.

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Assisted in the development of a web application using JavaScript and React Router.
Participated in code reviews and ensured high-quality deliverables.
